title: By the King, a proclamation prohibiting the keeping of the mart at Boston, in the county of Lincoln
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield ... for John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Oxford, the tenth day of November, in the seventeenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
